name: Sniper Hunter Adventure 3D
description: Travel in an epic journey to hunt animals with your sniper rifle! With access to powerful snipers you will rely on your marksman skills to hunt animals. There are in total 48 missions to complete with 7 sniper rifles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB or higher Storage: 155 MB available space
